aboutme.text.part1: My name is Borja Pintos. I am Computer engineer and my current job is programmer. but in my free time I do things like this application.
aboutme.text.part2: I love the computing and above all learn new things.
aboutme.text.part3: You can find me on the following social networks to contact me.
information.text.part1: This application is an archetype for any project with user management with a 2nd authentication factor, LATCH and AUTHY
information.text.part2: Prepared to select a database by changing environment variables and internationalization, you can add new languages adding only local files.
information.text.part3: I hope you like help and if you have any suggestions feel free to participate.
four04.default.text: I'm sorry, the page or resource you are searching for is currently unavailable.
index.default.text: This project is educational, and teach you how the 2nd factor authentication or to integrate it into a similar application.
